mph.beans.sessions

Interface UserLoginFunctionalities

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BasicUserManagerInterface, ProfessorManagerRemote, StudentManagerRemote, UserSessionInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProfessorManager, StudentManager

    interface UserLoginFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods which allow the MPH users to log in or log out from the system

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void login(java.lang.String theUsername, PasswordHashDTO thePasswordHash)
      Log into the MPH system the user identified by the username given as parameter
      void logout()
      Log out a user from the system

    • Method Detail

      • login

        void login(java.lang.String theUsername,
         PasswordHashDTO thePasswordHash)
           throws InvalidArgumentException,
                  AlreadyLoggedInException,
                  UserDoesNotExistException,
                  PasswordMismatchException
        Log into the MPH system the user identified by the username given as parameter
        Parameters:
        theUsername - the username
        thePasswordHash - the hash of the user password
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if one of the arguments is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in
        UserDoesNotExistException - if the username given as parameter is not registered into the system
        PasswordMismatchException - if the hash given as parameter does not match with the one saved into the database
        AlreadyLoggedInException

      • logout

        void logout()
            throws UserNotLoggedInException
        Log out a user from the system
        Throws:
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in
